text: Va [ej pajomʙar, jod kun] hangome ki Alloh taolo az kasone, ki kitoʙi [osmonī] ʙa onon doda şuda ʙud, pajmon girift, ki: "Hatman, [omūzahoi hidojatʙaxşi] onro ʙaroi mardum ʙajon namoed va [on ciro, ki nuʙuvvati Muhammad xaʙar medihad] kitmonaş nakuned"; va [-le] on [ahd]-ro puşti sari xeş andoxtand [ʙad-on tavaççuhe nakardand] va ʙa ʙahoi andake [hamcun molu maqom] furūxtand.
